value.string: Task Description: This task has the main loop of iterating through Excels in the input folder and calling subtasks to generate & format reports.

Task Dependecies: 1.0 MSR from Backstop_MasterTask
1.1 MSR from Backstop_ReadInputConfig

1.2 MSR from Backstop_Retrieve Input Excels
1.3 Download reports from Backstop
1.3.1 Logging into Backstop
1.3.2 MSR from Backstop_Format
1.4 MSR from Backstop_CloseApplications
